title: Master of Ninja World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Supernatural
tags: Abandoned Children   Appearance Changes   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beasts   Fanfiction   Male Protagonist   Ninjas   Overpowered Protagonist   Parody   Reincarnation   Sudden Strength Gain   Time Skip   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Werebeasts
author: 银子
description:
A boy from 21st century Earth, met an accident and later was reborn in Naruto's Ninja World.
He is born in Uchiha Family and becomes the useless brother of Itachi Uchiha and Sasuke Uchiha…. Let’s see how he changed the Naruto world.>
